message: When I enter the living room, I see Mink there, sitting on the couch watching TV with his pipe in hand.
Just the sight of him makes me nervous.
I try to walk by as casually as I can... but when I see his expression, I freeze.
Mink looks angry.
I'm not imagining it. His furrowed brow and tense cheeks are a clear―and rare―display of emotion.
His eyes are focused intently on the TV.
The news is on. It's a story about some kind of mass arrest.
Shock ripples through me. Those men being led away on the screen, hands cuffed, heads down...
...They're the guys from Scratch. Mink's guys.
Akushima must have caught them...
I listen as the newscaster describes them as terrorists with a grudge against the Toue Corporation.
They'll be sentenced, the report says, after the Special Celebration due to take place in a matter of days.
The image switches to one of Toue's face.

name: 東江
message: "My honored guests, I must first offer my most humble apologies for the disturbance."

name: 東江
message: "The blame rests entirely with me for allowing these vile terrorists to infiltrate these hallowed grounds."

name: 東江
message: "But I ask you to take pity on these foolhardy souls. They are simply all too aware of the gulf that separates us from them."

name: 東江
message: "Their envy of our perfect joy has forced them down this path."

name: 東江
message: "While they must and will be punished, I ask you please:"

name: 東江
message: "Do not hate them. They are not as fortunate as we, but they are no less human."

name: 東江
message: "Please, keep that thought in your hearts. I, too, will weigh their misfortune when it comes time to decide their fate."

name: 東江
message: "I hope that you will all find compassion for them."
The clip of Toue ends.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Disgusting."
The word slips from my lips.
I've never seen anything so creepy.
Do the other guests of Platinum Jail find that shit inspiring? They'd have to be completely deranged.

name: ミンク
message: "...Motherfucker."
Mink looses a smoky growl, the furrows on his brow deepening.
I know that however angry I am, it can't hold a candle to the rage Mink must be feeling.
Those were Mink's guys. They fought and sacrificed for him.
And now...
Toue said he'd deal with them after the celebration.
If we don't save them before then...

name: ミンク
message: "...We're going in tonight."
His voice is flat again, as usual, but I know that the emotion I saw on his face earlier is how he truly feels.
This is it. The point of no return.
For both of us.
I still have my doubts about Mink. That mysterious phone call still nags at my mind.
But for some reason, I'm not as afraid anymore.
Maybe I've just kind of given up. I know I'll never win against Mink.
Plus, there's what I saw in my room last night. I'm still not sure if that was real or a dream...
But when I saw Mink gazing out the window, something changed inside me.
Where before I felt only anger and disgust, now curiosity is stronger than either. I want to know more about him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm going too."

name: ミンク
message: "...Of course you are."
With that, Mink disappears into his room.
I replay his last words to me. It was just another of his curt statements, but this time, it felt different.
Maybe I'm blowing it out of proportion... but it felt like the first time Mink actually answered me.
Finally... we're going to the tower.
Gathering my resolve, I wait for night to come.
